mapper.sql: ID, ORDER_ID, SRC_ID, RECEIPT_PLAN_ID, PRO_COM, PRO_ID, PRO_NAME, PRO_TYPE, SEND_NUM, PRO_PRICE, PRO_MODEL, SEND_DATE, LOG_COM, W_NUMBER, ISDEALL, SN_BEGIN_NUM, SN_END_NUM, LOG_TYPE, C_TIME, C_USER, STATUS

distinct
from O_LOGISTICS
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into O_LOGISTICS (ID, ORDER_ID, SRC_ID, RECEIPT_PLAN_ID, PRO_COM, PRO_ID, PRO_NAME, PRO_TYPE, SEND_NUM, PRO_PRICE, PRO_MODEL, SEND_DATE, LOG_COM, W_NUMBER, ISDEALL, SN_BEGIN_NUM, SN_END_NUM, LOG_TYPE, C_TIME, C_USER, STATUS ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiptPlanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{proPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{proModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{logCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdeall,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{snBeginNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{snEndNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

mapper.update:
update O_LOGISTICS
ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_ID = #{srcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECEIPT_PLAN_ID = #{receiptPlanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_COM = #{proCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_ID = #{proId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_NAME = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_TYPE = #{proType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_NUM = #{sendNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRO_PRICE = #{proPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRO_MODEL = #{proModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_DATE = #{sendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOG_COM = #{logCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
W_NUMBER = #{wNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISDEALL = #{isdeall,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SN_BEGIN_NUM = #{snBeginNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SN_END_NUM = #{snEndNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOG_TYPE = #{logType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_TIME = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_USER = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update O_LOGISTICS set ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_ID = #{srcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECEIPT_PLAN_ID = #{receiptPlanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_COM = #{proCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_ID = #{proId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_NAME = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_TYPE = #{proType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_NUM = #{sendNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRO_PRICE = #{proPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRO_MODEL = #{proModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_DATE = #{sendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LOG_COM = #{logCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, W_NUMBER = #{wNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDEALL = #{isdeall,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SN_BEGIN_NUM = #{snBeginNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SN_END_NUM = #{snEndNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOG_TYPE = #{logType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TIME = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, C_USER = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

mapper.select: SELECT L.SEND_NUM as sendnum, L.SEND_NUM * L.PRO_PRICE as proPrice, R.PLAN_NUM,R.PLAN_ORDER_STATUS,R.ORDER_ID,R.PRO_COM,R.PLAN_PRO_NUM,R.SEND_PRO_NUM, R.MODEL,R.SEND_DATE,R.REAL_SEND_DATE,R.RETURN_ORDER_DETAIL_ID, P.PRO_CODE,P.PRO_ID,P.PRO_NAME,P.PRO_NUM,P.SEND_NUM, O.ADDR_REALNAME,O.RECEIPT_STATUS, L.LOG_COM,L.LOG_TYPE,L.W_NUMBER,L.SN_BEGIN_NUM,L.SN_END_NUM,TO_CHAR(L.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS O_LOGISTICS_SEND_DATE, AGENT.ID,AGENT.AG_NAME,AGENT.AG_UNIQ_NUM, c.PLATFORM_NAME,O.addr_mobile,O.addr_detail, to_char(ORDERS.O_INURETIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') as TIME, to_char(L.send_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as SENDTIME,oso.ACTIVITY_NAME,os.PRO_TYPE FROM O_LOGISTICS L LEFT JOIN O_RECEIPT_PLAN R ON L.RECEIPT_PLAN_ID = R.ID LEFT JOIN O_RECEIPT_ORDER O ON O.ID = R.RECEIPT_ID LEFT JOIN O_RECEIPT_PRO P ON R.PRO_ID = P.ID LEFT JOIN O_ORDER ORDERS ON L.ORDER_ID=ORDERS.ID LEFT JOIN A_AGENT AGENT ON ORDERS.AGENT_ID=AGENT.ID left join a_platform c on c.platform_num = ORDERS.order_platform left join o_payment d on d.order_id = o.id left join o_sub_order os on os.order_id=L.order_id and os.pro_id=L.pro_id and os.status=1 left join o_sub_order_activity oso on oso.sub_order_id=os.id and oso.status=1

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM O_LOGISTICS L LEFT JOIN O_RECEIPT_PLAN R ON L.RECEIPT_PLAN_ID = R.ID LEFT JOIN O_RECEIPT_ORDER O ON O.ID = R.RECEIPT_ID LEFT JOIN O_RECEIPT_PRO P ON R.PRO_ID = P.ID LEFT JOIN O_ORDER ORDERS ON L.ORDER_ID=ORDERS.ID LEFT JOIN A_AGENT AGENT ON ORDERS.AGENT_ID=AGENT.ID left join a_platform c on c.platform_num = ORDERS.order_platform left join o_payment d on d.order_id = o.id left join o_sub_order os on os.order_id=L.order_id and os.pro_id=L.pro_id and os.status=1 left join o_sub_order_activity oso on oso.sub_order_id=os.id and oso.status=1

if.test: begin != null and end != null and end >0

sql.if: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM (

if.test: begin != null and end != null and end >0

mapper.select: select detail.order_id as orderId,detail.order_num as orderNum,logi.id as logisticsId,detail.pro_id as proId,detail.pro_name as proName,logi.pro_type as proType,detail.settlement_price as proPrice ,logi.pro_MODEL as proModel,logi.Log_type as logType,detail.agent_id as agentId,logi.pro_com as proCom,detail.sn_num as sn, logi.pro_MODEL as proModel,logi.Receipt_plan_id as receiptId from o_logistics_detail detail,O_LOGISTICS logi where detail.sn_num = #{SN,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and detail.status = '1' and detail.record_status = '1' and detail.agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and detail.logistics_id=logi.ID

select detail.order_id as orderId,detail.order_num as orderNum,logi.id as logisticsId,detail.pro_id as proId,detail.pro_name as proName,logi.pro_type as proType,detail.settlement_price as proPrice ,logi.pro_MODEL as proModel,logi.Log_type as logType,detail.agent_id as agentId,logi.pro_com as proCom,detail.sn_num as sn, logi.pro_MODEL as proModel,logi.Receipt_plan_id as receiptId from o_logistics_detail detail,O_LOGISTICS logi where detail.sn_num >= #{startSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and detail.sn_num <= #{endSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and detail.status = '1' and detail.record_status = '1' and detail.agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and detail.logistics_id=logi.ID order by detail.order_id asc , detail.pro_id asc, detail.sn_num asc
